content.rendered:
SLEEKNOTE FOR B2B

Grow Your B2B Company with Popups

Sleeknote has everything you need to capture warm leads, sell more products, and more. Read on to learn how Sleeknote can help you grow your B2B company.

Create Your First Campaign Now

The #1 Popup FOR B2B Marketers

Meet Sleeknote: A Popup Builder for Smart, Savvy Marketers

There’s more to website popups than growing your list. Sleeknote makes it easy to create multiple popups based on where visitors are on their journey. Whether you want to collect a first time visitor’s email or invite a returning prospect to get in touch, Sleeknote has everything you need to manage and grow a thriving B2B company. Don’t take our word. Try Sleeknote, risk-free, for 7-days. (No credit card required.)

Create Your First Campaign Now

Use Case

Make Eye-Catching Popups—Quickly and Easily

B2B marketers love Sleeknote’s user-friendly popup builder. With our drag-and-drop editor and 120+ conversion-ready templates, you can create brand-centric website popups in minutes—both for desktop and mobile.

 

Capture Warm Leads for Sales

Not all deals are closed online. Offer custom quotes to enterprise prospects or invite warm leads to get in touch to learn more about your offers. Use one of our 1,200+ integrations to notify your sales team in real-time.

Use Case

Collect Top-Funnel Leads

Grow your list by offering lead magnets such as eBooks and whitepapers. With our Multistep feature, you can enrich your leads to learn more about their company size, budget, and more—without losing conversions.

Use Case

Offer Free Samples

Selling complicated products online is hard—especially in B2B. Use a timely popup to offer prospects a free sample before they purchase. Perfect for category-specific products.

Use Case

Promote Limited-Time Offers

Whether you’re promoting Black Friday or an upcoming holiday clearout, drive urgency by adding countdown timers, to your popups.

Use Case

Sleeknote Works With Your Favorite Tools. Choose from Our 1,200+ Integrations (No Developer Needed)

We were really impressed by how easy it was to get started with Sleeknote and integrate with other services.

Steffen Hedebrandt
Head of Marketing, Airtame

The Features You Need to Grow Your B2B Company

Multistep Campaigns

 Go beyond asking leads for a name and an email address. Use our signature Multistep feature to enrich your lead data to learn a prospect’s budget, availability, and more. Get the details you need to close bigger deals without losing conversions.

New vs Returning Subscribers

No two visitors are alike. Each has their own needs based on where they are in your funnel. Ask first-time visitors for their email address. Nudge returning subscribers to get in contact. Invite returning buyers to refer a friend. Create campaigns for all your marketing needs.

SiteData Detection

Use SitaData Merge Tags to personalize a campaign’s copy. Get more email subscribers by adding a visitor’s industry to the campaign’s headline. Welcome back a returning subscriber by mentioning their name in the campaign’s copy. The possibilities are endless.

Create Your First Campaign Now

2,000+ B2B Marketers Enjoy Sleeknote Every Day
